name: Diamond Cruch - Gems Game
description:
Diamond Cruch - Gems Game is the most popular match 3 game. Featuring 1000+ sparkly levels filled with awesome match 3 challenges, beautiful gems and crystals and tons of awesome rewards and surprises.
Features:
- Addictive gameplay
- Easy and fun to play
- Beautiful graphics and effects
- Start a magical journey and travel across the enchanted forest-it’s fun and entertaining!
